Row.Text: Is that the kind of leader you really are, running around attacking everyone?! Then, I'm going to make sure you never do it again!
Is that the kind of leader you really are, running around attacking everyone?! Then, I'm going to make sure you never do it again!
I won't lose. There's no way I'll lose to someone like you, no matter how hopeless it looks--!
I won't lose. There's no way I'll lose to someone like you, no matter how hopeless it looks--!
Hahaha! Have you noticed how much stronger I am than you? Well, maybe it's time for you to find out, the hard way.
Hahaha! Have you noticed how much stronger I am than you? Well, maybe it's time for you to find out, the hard way.
Ohh? Bad idea, buddy. I've been training my butt off so I can beat punks like you without a sweat. Well then, come see what the new Sayaka-chan is made of!
Ohh? Bad idea, buddy. I've been training my butt off so I can beat punks like you without a sweat. Well then, come see what the new Sayaka-chan is made of!
Hrmm...you've definitely got an advantage over me. But all that means is that justice will be on my side, and I'm going to prevail despite the odds!
Hrmm...you've definitely got an advantage over me. But all that means is that justice will be on my side, and I'm going to prevail despite the odds!

Are you serious? No, seriously, you're really serious, coming at me with an army that puny? Pffthahaha! Oh man, I can't even call myself a hero for winning this fight -- which I'm going to do, by the way.

Are you serious? No, seriously, you're really serious, coming at me with an army that puny? Pffthahaha! Oh man, I can't even call myself a hero for winning this fight -- which I'm going to do, by the way.
So, even in this world, making a wish creates an equal curse. Hehehe...hahaha! It doesn't matter what all I went through, it all crumbled to dirt again! Hahaha! What a sick world! Ahahahaha--!
...in the end, I still couldn't save anyone. And I couldn't do anything for myself, either. Thanks to you, everything has been destroyed.[NEWLINE]I'm...such a fool...
You thought you would meet a famous historical leader? Too bad! It was just Queen Sayaka-chan!

Whoa, hold on! The way you're dressed, you've gotta be the head of a country, right? My name is Sayaka Miki, and I lead these Oktavians! What does "Oktavian" mean? Mmh...let's, uh, not talk about that.
Yo! Nice to see you again! Let's listen to some music while we're here...do you prefer Handel, or maybe Mussorgsky? Dvorak?
Yo! Nice to see you again! Let's listen to some music while we're here...do you prefer Handel, or maybe Mussorgsky? Dvorak?
Hey there.
What's up?
You...what are you doing here? If you're here to fight, I won't back down!
You...what are you doing here? If you're here to fight, I won't back down!
And I thought that damn Transfer Student was bad. You make her look like a saint!
And I thought that damn Transfer Student was bad. You make her look like a saint!
You're like Kyouko was, watching me so you can plot on how you can beat me and take my territory. I'm a lot stronger than I was back then. You should really reconsider doing that.
Do you think you can just keep throwing around new settlements around here without me caring? You had better stop, right now!
Let's sign an Open Borders agreement! I'm sure your people would like to hear more of my music!
Let's sign an Open Borders agreement! I'm sure your people would like to hear more of my music!
This was a pretty good deal. What do you say we sign off on it again?
This was a pretty good deal. What do you say we sign off on it again?
This deal isn't good enough for me anymore. Let's get back to the dealing table.
This deal isn't good enough for me anymore. Let's get back to the dealing table.
Whoa, you've really got a lot of money...hahaha, you must be quite a hoarder!
Whoa, you've really got a lot of money...hahaha, you must be quite a hoarder!
You've got a really powerful army, don't you? I'm glad we're on good terms with each other -- if we join forces, we could be real Allies of Justice!
You've got a really powerful army, don't you? I'm glad we're on good terms with each other -- if we join forces, we could be real Allies of Justice!
What do you want? Are you here to brag about how many people you've let die and how many cities you've burned to the ground? If you are, I'll be glad to shut you up.
What do you want? Are you here to brag about how many people you've let die and how many cities you've burned to the ground? If you are, I'll be glad to shut you up.
You know, I like you! You're honest and trustworthy...not like a lot of people I've known. You wanna tell the world that we're officially friends? C'mon!
You know, I like you! You're honest and trustworthy...not like a lot of people I've known. You wanna tell the world that we're officially friends? C'mon!
Ever since I heard you were friends with {1_CivName}, I started thinking that they were probably nice like you! Now we're friends, too! Let's all be friends forever!
Ever since I heard you were friends with {1_CivName}, I started thinking that they were probably nice like you! Now we're friends, too! Let's all be friends forever!
Oh hey, I heard you're friends with {1_CivName} now! We should all get together sometime and go see a concert!
Oh hey, I heard you're friends with {1_CivName} now! We should all get together sometime and go see a concert!
I'm not really good at this diplomacy thing, but hey, let's trade embassies. If we do that, we can, like...well, let's just do it!
I'm not really good at this diplomacy thing, but hey, let's trade embassies. If we do that, we can, like...well, let's just do it!
I'm not really good at this diplomacy thing, but hey, let's trade embassies. If we do that, we can, like...well, let's just do it!
I'm not really good at this diplomacy thing, but hey, let's trade embassies. If we do that, we can, like...well, let's just do it!
What's going on here?! We caught someone trying to steal from us, and we found out that they were employed by you! You better have a real good explanation for this...and it better not happen again.
What's going on here?! We caught someone trying to steal from us, and we found out that they were employed by you! You better have a real good explanation for this...and it better not happen again.
That damn {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} won't hold up against our power much longer!
That damn {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} won't hold up against our power much longer!
Alright!
Alright!
Nice!
Nice!
Okay!
Okay!
Wow, you're generous!
Wow, you're generous!
Sure, what's up?
Sure, what's up?
What is it?
What is it?
Sure, what's up?
Mmmm...doesn't sound fair, but maybe we could keep talking...
Mmmm...doesn't sound fair, but maybe we could keep talking...
Are you serious? That's ridiculous!
Are you serious? That's ridiculous!
That sounds good already!
That sounds good already!
How about this?
How about this?
How about this?
I don't wanna trade for that. Let's talk about something else!
I don't wanna trade for that. Let's talk about something else!
Thanks!
Thanks!
Thanks!
Awesome!
Awesome!
Great!
Aww, c'mon...
Aww, c'mon...
Aww, c'mon...
That...that was really nice of you! Thank you so much for saving my worker girls! You're a real Hero of Justice!
That...that was really nice of you! Thank you so much for saving my worker girls! You're a real Hero of Justice!
That...that was really nice of you! Thank you so much for saving my worker girls! You're a real Hero of Justice!
That...that was really nice of you! Thank you so much for saving my worker girls! You're a real Hero of Justice!
Oh, you're kidding, right? Hahaha! I still have to make sure you learn your lesson!
Oh, you're kidding, right? Hahaha! This fight's just gotten started...

You're a terrible person, and I'm gonna make sure the rest of the world knows it. People like you are why curses exist in this world![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You're a terrible person, and I'm gonna make sure the rest of the world knows it. People like you are why curses exist in this world![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You're a terrible person, and I'm gonna make sure the rest of the world knows it. People like you are why curses exist in this world![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I'm sure you've noticed that {1_PlayerName:textkey} is an evil leader. As an Ally of Justice, I can't stand by and let them keep doing what they're doing. Will you help me to teach them a lesson?
I'm sure you've noticed that {1_PlayerName:textkey} is an evil leader. As an Ally of Justice, I can't stand by and let them keep doing what they're doing. Will you help me to teach them a lesson?
I'm sure you've noticed that {1_PlayerName:textkey} is an evil leader. As an Ally of Justice, I can't stand by and let them keep doing what they're doing. Will you help me to teach them a lesson?
Have you been afflicted with a Witch Kiss? Oh, you haven't? Well, you should still jump off a building anyway.
I may have failed my math courses...and my English courses...oh, and my history courses. But I'm still not as dumb as you!
Hehehe. I bet even Kyubey could beat your army with his bare hands![NEWLINE]...bare paws!
What piece does your army march to, anyway? Taps? Just kidding, I'm sure it's Chopin's Funeral March.

Have your people ever heard of this stuff called "music"? It's really nice, you take instruments and use them to make harmonious sounds! But hey, I'm sure they'll never get to hear any good songs with your terrible leadership.
I'm not gonna lose to you! Not now, and not ever!
I'm not gonna lose to you! Not now, and not ever!
Tch...I...can't fight anymore. What will it take to call a truce...?
Tch...I...can't fight anymore. What will it take to call a truce...?
Tch...I...can't fight anymore. What will it take to call a truce...?
You...you bastard! If you're gonna announce that to the world, then I'm never gonna forgive you!
You...you bastard! If you're gonna announce that to the world, then I'm never gonna forgive you!
You...you bastard! If you're gonna announce that to the world, then I'm never gonna forgive you!
You...you bastard! If you're gonna announce that to the world, then I'm never gonna forgive you!
You...you bastard! If you're gonna announce that to the world, then I'm never gonna forgive you!

Wait, hold on...why is everyone playing YOUR music? What happened to our own music? No, this isn't right! Don't play their awful music![NEWLINE]...I hope you're happy with yourself. I gave up so much for him, and now look...nobody even seems to remember his work. Heheh, how sick...
